subject: probability
title: Binomial Distribution Theorem
contentHtml: The binomial distribution is a fundamental concept in probability theory that describes the number of successes in a fixed number of independent trials.
intuition: The binomial distribution theorem provides a way to calculate the probability of exactly k successes in n independent trials, each with a fixed probability p.
realWorldApplications: In machine learning, the binomial distribution is used in binary classification problems, such as spam vs. non-spam emails.
